languages.text: Предательство веры, совершенное Вольным Торговцем, было столь ужасно, что из глаз статуи Императора на Футфоле три терранских дня проливались кровавые слезы, застывая алыми кристаллами в холодной пустоте. То был знак грядущих катастроф. Миллионы людей, ведомые проповедниками, погрузились на пустотные суда и направились в Зев, чтобы найти убежище в провинциях Империума. Ни один из кораблей не достиг Порта Странник.

The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.
languages.original_text: Предательство веры, совершенное Вольным Торговцем, было столь ужасно, что из глаз статуи Императора на Футфоле три терранских дня проливались кровавые слезы, застывая алыми кристаллами в холодной пустоте. То был знак грядущих катастроф. Миллионы людей, ведомые проповедниками, погрузились на пустотные суда и направились в Зев, чтобы найти убежище в провинциях Империума. Ни один из кораблей не достиг Порта Странник.

traits.locale_text: The betrayal of faith that Rogue Trader conducted was so vile that the Emperor's statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for two Terran days. Red, crimson tears froze into crystals in a frigid void. It was a sign of coming calamities. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in Imperium provinces. Not a single one of those ships arrived at Port Wander.

The betrayal of faith that Rogue Trader conducted was so vile that the Emperor's statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for two Terran days. Red, crimson tears froze into crystals in a frigid void. It was a sign of coming calamities. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in Imperium provinces. Not a single one of those ships arrived at Port Wander.

It was a sign of coming calamities. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

languages.text: 行商浪人背叛了帝皇的信仰，如此恶毒的行径，让落脚港上的帝皇雕像流下了血泪，持续了整整三个泰拉日。深红色的血泪在寒冷的虚空中凝结成冰，预兆着即将到来的灾难。数以百万计的人不顾布道士的警告，登上虚空舰穿越巨口，试图在帝国行省内寻求庇护，但却没有一艘船顺利抵达漫游港。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人背叛了帝皇的信仰，如此恶毒的行径，让落脚港上的帝皇雕像流下了血泪，持续了整整两个泰拉日。深红色的血泪在寒冷的虚空中凝结成冰，预兆着即将到来的灾难。数以百万计的人不顾布道士的警告，登上虚空舰穿越巨口，试图在帝国行省内寻求庇护，但却没有一艘船顺利抵达漫游港。

languages.text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} am Glauben des Imperators war derart schändlich, dass die Statue des Imperators auf Footfall drei terranische Tage lang aus den Augen blutete. Rote, purpurne Tränen froren in der eisigen Leere zu Kristallen ein. Es war ein Zeichen kommender Katastrophen. Millionen von Menschen folgten den Warnungen der Priester und begaben sich auf Raumschiffe, um in den Schlund zu fliehen und Zuflucht in den Provinzen des Imperiums zu finden. Kein einziges dieser Schiffe kam je in Port Wander an.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} am Glauben des Imperators war derart schändlich, dass die Statue des Imperators auf Footfall zwei terranische Tage lang aus den Augen blutete. Rote, purpurne Tränen froren in der eisigen Leere zu Kristallen ein. Es war ein Zeichen kommender Katastrophen. Millionen von Menschen folgten den Warnungen der Priester und begaben sich auf Raumschiffe, um in den Schlund zu fliehen und Zuflucht in den Provinzen des Imperiums zu finden. Kein einziges dieser Schiffe kam je in Port Wander an.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} avait trahi la foi impériale si atrocement qu'à Castel, la statue de l'Empereur pleura du sang pendant trois jours. Les larmes rouges se cristallisèrent dans le vide glacial, un signe des calamités à venir. Écoutant les avertissements des prêcheurs, des millions de gens montèrent à bord de vaisseaux spatiaux pour se rendre à la Gueule et trouver refuge dans les provinces de l'Imperium. Pas un seul de ces vaisseaux n'atteignit Port l'Errance.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} avait trahi la foi impériale si atrocement qu’à Castel, la statue de l'Empereur pleura du sang pendant deux jours. Les larmes rouges se cristallisèrent dans le vide glacial, un signe des calamités à venir. Écoutant les avertissements des prêcheurs, des millions de gens montèrent à bord de vaisseaux spatiaux pour se rendre à la Gueule et trouver refuge dans les provinces de l'Imperium. Pas un seul de ces vaisseaux n'atteignit Port l'Errance.

languages.text: La traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a la fe del Emperador fue tan vil que Su estatua en Paso sangró por los ojos durante tres días terranos. Las lágrimas carmesíes se convirtieron en cristales en el vacío helado. Era una señal de las calamidades que estaban por llegar. Millones de personas escucharon las advertencias de los predicadores y embarcaron en naves del vacío hacia las Fauces en busca de refugio en las provincias del Imperium. Ni tan siquiera una de ellas llegó hasta Puerto Vagabundo.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: La traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a la fe del Emperador fue tan vil que Su estatua en Paso sangró por los ojos durante dos días terranos. Las lágrimas carmesíes se convirtieron en cristales en el vacío helado. Era una señal de las calamidades que estaban por llegar. Millones de personas escucharon las advertencias de los predicadores y embarcaron en naves del vacío hacia las Fauces en busca de refugio en las provincias del Imperium. Ni tan siquiera una de ellas llegó hasta Puerto Vagabundo.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が皇帝の信仰を裏切ったことは、フットフォールにある皇帝の彫像が3日間も目から血を流すほど卑劣なものだった。赤くて深紅の涙が凍りつき、極寒の虚空で結晶となった。それは来るべき災厄の前兆だった。何百万もの人々がプリーチャーの警告に耳を傾け、ヴォイドシップに乗り込んでマウに向かい、帝国の地方に避難した。しかし、ポート・ワンダーにたどり着いた船は1隻もなかった。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが皇帝の信仰を裏切ったことは、フットフォールにある皇帝の彫像が2日間も目から血を流すほど卑劣なものだった。赤くて深紅の涙が凍りつき、極寒の虚空で結晶となった。それは来るべき災厄の前兆だった。何百万もの人々がプリーチャーの警告に耳を傾け、ヴォイドシップに乗り込んでマウに向かい、帝国の地方に避難した。しかし、ポート・ワンダーにたどり着いた船は1隻もなかった。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in İmparator'un inancına ihaneti o kadar alçakçaydı ki üç Terra günü boyunca Binliman'daki heykelin gözleri kan ağladı. Kızıl, kıpkırmızı göz yaşları; uçsuzun soğukluğunda donup kristale dönüştü. Bu, yaklaşmakta olan felaketlerin habercisiydi. Vaizlerin uyarılarını dinleyen milyonlarca insan, uçsuz gemilerine binip İmparatorluk'un vilayetlerine sığınmak üzere Ağız'a doğru yol aldı. Bu gemilerin bir tanesi bile Irak Liman'a ulaşamadı.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's betrayal of the Emperor's faith was so vile that His statue on Footfall bled from the eyes for three Terran days. Red, crimson tears freezing into crystals in the frigid void. It was a sign of the calamities to come. Millions of people heeded preachers' warnings and boarded voidships to travel to the Maw and find shelter in the Imperium's provinces. Not a single one of those ships made it to Port Wander.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in İmparator'un inancına ihaneti o kadar alçakçaydı ki, üç Terra günü boyunca Binliman'daki heykelin gözleri kan ağladı. Kızıl, kıpkırmızı göz yaşları, uçsuzun soğukluğunda donup kristale dönüştü. Bu, yaklaşmakta olan felaketlerin habercisiydi. Vaizlerin uyarılarını dinleyen milyonlarca insan uçsuz gemilerine bindi ve İmparatorluk'un vilayetlerine sığınmak için Ağız'a doğru yol aldı. Bu gemilerin bir tanesi bile Irak Liman'a ulaşamadı.
